title: OpenAI Announces 100 Million H100 GPU Cluster for AGI Training
summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced today that the company has secured 100 million NVIDIA H100 GPUs for a massive training cluster, with total power consumption expected to reach 5 GW.
author: Jane Reporter

title: Google DeepMind's New Model Achieves Human-Level Performance on GPQA Diamond
summary: Google DeepMind announced Gemini 3 Ultra today, claiming it achieves 89% on GPQA Diamond, matching expert-level performance on graduate physics questions.
author: John News

title: White House Announces Mandatory AI Safety Audits for Frontier Models
summary: The Biden administration unveiled new regulations requiring third-party security audits and attestation for AI systems trained with more than 10^26 FLOPs.
author: Sarah Political
